results.title: Results
results.pie.title: Number of validations per species
results.userTable.title: Participants
validation.fixFraming.label: Do you want to fix the framing of the vocalization?
validation.title: Validate species
validation.templates.description: Use the template candidates or audio files provided below to create new templates. Double-clicking any of them will open a new tab where you can reframe (if needed) and confirm them as templates.
validation.templates.audio.description: This window allows you to browse through the audio from where the template/candidate originates. Should you reframe the template, click the blue button below and draw the frame of a new template. You can study the audio closer by changing the time buffer, focus frequency and by cropping it.
validation.templates.candidates.descript: Candidates for templates and their original audio files are presented here. From this view you can briefly see the available material for templates. The templates are shown as orange frames and candidates as blue frames. Click any of the images below to create a template for the species.
validation.templates.template.descriptio: In this window you’ll see the current framing of the template. Click ”confirm” to save the candidate as a template or to validate the template.
validation.templates.description2: Listen through the templates by clickling them once. If modifications are needed you can reframe and remove the existing templates by double clicking them. This will open them into a new tab. You can confirm the templates all at once by clicking the blue button below or one-by-one by double clicking and confirming them separately.
validation.templates.saveAndReturn: Save and return to species list
validation.templates.remove.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this template?
validation.templates.confirmAndComment: Are you sure you want to reframe / remove the template? If so, provide an explanation for this in the comment field below. This will remove all the previous validations of the template.
validation.templates.maxNbrOfTemplates: There are already 10 templates. Please remove one before creating a new one.
speciesList.title: Validate bird sound identifications
validation.save: Save and go back to species list
validation.isTheSpeciesVocalizing: Is the target species vocalizing inside the white frame?
validation.leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave?
validation.missingValidations: Please validate all vocalizations before submitting answers. Following are missing validations:
